</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A ID="S7D88A0B245E8547DACEB640D263B3436">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(12)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Derivative Instruments and Hedging Activities
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Partnership&#8217;s revenues and cost of products sold are materially impacted by changes in NGL prices. Additionally, the Partnership's results of operations are materially impacted by changes in interest rates. In an effort to manage its exposure to these risks, the Partnership periodically enters into various derivative instruments, including commodity and interest rate hedges. All of the Partnership's derivatives are non-hedge derivatives and therefore all changes in fair values are recognized as gains and losses in the earnings of the periods in which they occur.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Commodity Derivative Instruments
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Partnership from time to time has used derivatives to manage the risk of commodity price fluctuation. Commodity risk is the adverse effect on the value of a liability or future purchase that results from a change in commodity price.&#160; The Partnership has established a hedging policy and monitors and manages the commodity market risk associated with potential commodity risk exposure.&#160;&#160;In addition, the Partnership has focused on utilizing counterparties for these transactions whose financial condition is appropriate for the credit risk involved in each specific transaction. The Partnership has entered into hedging transactions as of December 31, 2016 to protect a portion of its commodity price risk exposure. These hedging arrangements are in the form of swaps for NGLs. The Partnership has instruments totaling a notional quantity of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	731,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	barrels settling during the period from January 31, 2017 through June 30, 2017. These instruments settle against the applicable pricing source for each grade and location. MET serves as the counterparty for all positions outstanding at December 31, 2016.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Due to the acquisition of the remaining interests of Cardinal on August 29, 2014, the Partnership acquired a notional quantity of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	3,631,740
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	MMBtu of natural gas call options with a strike price of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$4.50
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per MMBtu.&#160; These options managed the
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	89
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage93"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MARTIN MIDSTREAM PARTNERS L.P.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(Dollars in thousands, except where otherwise indicated)
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	purchase of base gas at Monroe Gas Storage Company, LLC for the portion of base gas that was leased with Credit Suisse at the acquisition date and was scheduled to be returned in January and February 2015.&#160; The options were set to settle in
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	two
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increments of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	2,345,498
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	MMBtu and
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	1,286,242
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	MMBtu on January 31, 2015 and February 28, 2015, respectively. On December 31, 2014, the Partnership terminated these options, resulting in a termination benefit of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$3
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was recorded in "Other, net" in the Partnership's Consolidated Statement of Operations for the year ended December 31, 2014. &#160;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Interest Rate Derivative Instruments
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Partnership is exposed to market risks associated with interest rates. Market risk is the adverse effect on the value of a financial instrument that results from a change in interest rates. We minimize this market risk by establishing and monitoring parameters that limit the types and degree of market risk that may be undertaken. The Partnership enters into interest rate swaps to manage interest rate risk associated with the Partnership&#8217;s variable rate credit facility and it's senior unsecured notes.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of December 31, 2015, the Partnership had a fixed-to-variable interest rate swap agreement with a notional principal amount of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$50,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, effectively converting the interest expense associated with a portion of the Partnership's 2021 senior unsecured notes from fixed rate to variable rate based on the LIBOR interest rate. The Partnership's swap agreement has a termination date that corresponds to the maturity date of the 2021 senior unsecured notes. As of December&#160;31, 2015, the maximum length of time over which the Partnership has hedged a portion of its exposure to the variability in the value of this debt due to interest rate risk is through December of 2020. This instrument is recorded on the Partnership's Consolidated Balance Sheets at December 31, 2015 in "Fair value of derivatives" as a non current liability of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$206
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This position terminated on January 7, 2016, resulting in a benefit of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$160
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	twelve months ended December 31, 2016
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 2015, the Partnership entered into contracts which provided the counterparty the option to enter into swap contracts to hedge the Partnership's exposure to changes in the fair value of its senior unsecured notes ("interest rate swaptions"). In connection with the interest rate swaption contracts, the Partnership received premiums of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$630
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$2,495
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which represented their fair value on the date the transactions were initiated and were initially recorded as derivative liabilities on the Partnership's Consolidated Balance Sheet, during the
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	twelve months ended December 31, 2016
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 2015, respectively. Each of the interest rate swaptions was fully amortized as of December 31, 2016. Interest rate swaption contract premiums received are amortized over the period from initiation of the contract through their termination date. For the
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	twelve months ended December 31, 2016
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 2015, the Partnership recognized
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$630
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$2,495
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively, of premium in "Interest expense, net" on the Partnership's Consolidated Statement of Operations related to the interest rate swaption contracts.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On April 1, 2014, the Partnership entered into
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	two
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fixed-to-variable interest rate swap agreements with an aggregate notional amount of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$100,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	each to hedge its exposure to changes in the fair value of its senior unsecured notes.&#160; On May 14, 2014 the Partnership terminated these swaps and received a termination benefit of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$2,380
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	upon cancellation of these swap agreements. This amount was recorded in "Interest expense, net" in the Partnership's Consolidated Statement of Operations for the year ended December 31, 2014. Additionally, subsequent to the termination on May 14, 2014, the Partnership entered into
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	two
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fixed-to-variable interest rate swap agreements on May 14, 2014 with an aggregate notional amount of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$100,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	each to hedge its exposure to changes in the fair value of its senior unsecured notes. In August 2014, the Partnership received a scheduled swap settlement related to these agreements totaling
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$976
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. This amount was recorded in "Interest expense, net" in the Partnership's Consolidated Statement of Operations for the year ended December 31, 2014.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On September 18, 2014, the Partnership entered into a fixed-to-variable interest rate swap agreement, with an aggregate notional amount of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$50,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, to hedge its exposure to changes in the fair value of its senior unsecured notes.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On October 9, 2014, the Partnership terminated each of its
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	three
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	outstanding swaps, receiving a termination benefit of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$2,125
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was recorded in "Interest expense, net" in the Partnership's Consolidated Statement of Operations for the year ended December 31, 2014.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Subsequent to the termination on October 9, 2014, the Partnership entered into
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	two
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fixed-to-variable interest rate swap agreements, each with an aggregate notional amount of

<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$50,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to hedge its exposure to changes in the fair value of its senior unsecured notes. On October 14, 2014, the Partnership terminated each of these
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	two
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	swaps, receiving a termination benefit of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$500
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was recorded in "Interest expense, net" in the Partnership's Consolidated Statement of Operations for the year ended December 31, 2014.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">

<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	90
</SPAN>

<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MARTIN MIDSTREAM PARTNERS L.P.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(Dollars in thousands, except where otherwise indicated)
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Subsequent to the termination on October 14, 2014, the Partnership entered into
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	two
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fixed-to-variable interest rate swap agreements, each with an aggregate notional amount of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$50,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to hedge its exposure to changes in the fair value of its senior unsecured notes. On October 14, 2014, the Partnership terminated each of these
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	two
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	swaps, receiving a termination benefit of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$711
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was recorded in "Interest expense, net" in the Partnership's Consolidated Statement of Operations for the year ended December 31, 2014.
</SPAN>

<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For information regarding fair value amounts and gains and losses on interest rate derivative instruments and related hedged items, see "Tabular Presentation of Gains and Losses on Derivative Instruments and Related Hedged Items" below.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Tabular Presentation of Gains and Losses on Derivative Instruments

	(13)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Related Party Transactions

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	As of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Martin Resource Management owned
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
<SPAN>
	6,264,532
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Partnership&#8217;s common units representing approximately
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
<SPAN>
	17.7%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Partnership&#8217;s outstanding limited partnership units.&#160;&#160;Martin Resource Management controls the Partnership's general partner by virtue of its
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	51%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	voting interest in Holdings, the sole member of the Partnership's general partner. The Partnership&#8217;s general partner, MMGP, owns a
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
<SPAN>
	2%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	general partner interest in the Partnership and the Partnership&#8217;s incentive distribution rights.&#160;&#160;The Partnership&#8217;s general partner&#8217;s ability, as general partner, to manage and operate the Partnership, and Martin Resource Management&#8217;s ownership as of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, of approximately
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
<SPAN>
	17.7%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the
</SPAN>
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Partnership&#8217;s outstanding limited partnership units, effectively gives Martin Resource Management the ability to veto some of the Partnership&#8217;s actions and to control the Partnership&#8217;s management.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following is a description of the Partnership&#8217;s material related party agreements:
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Omnibus Agreement
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Omnibus Agreement
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&#160;&#160;The Partnership and its general partner are parties to the Omnibus Agreement dated November 1, 2002, with Martin Resource Management that governs, among other things, potential competition and indemnification obligations among the parties to the agreement, related party transactions, the provision of general administration and support services by Martin Resource Management and the Partnership&#8217;s use of certain Martin Resource Management trade names and trademarks. The Omnibus Agreement was amended on November 25, 2009, to include processing crude oil into finished products including naphthenic lubricants, distillates, asphalt and other intermediate cuts. The Omnibus Agreement was amended further on October 1, 2012, to permit the Partnership to provide certain lubricant packaging products and services to Martin Resource Management.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Non-Competition Provisions
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Martin Resource Management has agreed for so long as it controls the general partner of the Partnership, not to engage in the business of:
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8226;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	providing terminalling and storage services for petroleum products and by-products including the refining, blending and packaging of finished lubricants;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<SPAN STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	&#8226;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	providing marine transportation of petroleum products and by-products;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<SPAN STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	&#8226;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	distributing NGLs; and
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<SPAN STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	&#8226;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	manufacturing and selling sulfur-based fertilizer products and other sulfur-related products.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This restriction does not apply to:
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>

</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>

</SPAN>
</DIV>

</SPAN>
</DIV>

	any business that Martin Resource Management acquires or constructs that has a fair market value of less than
</SPAN>

<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8226;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	any business that Martin Resource Management acquires or constructs that has a fair market value of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$5,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or more if the Partnership has been offered the opportunity to purchase the business for fair market value and the Partnership declines to do so with the concurrence of the Conflicts Committee; and
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8226;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	any business that Martin Resource Management acquires or constructs where a portion of such business includes a restricted business and the fair market value of the restricted business is
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$5,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or more and represents less than
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	20%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the aggregate value of the entire business to be acquired or constructed; provided that, following completion of the acquisition or construction, the Partnership will be provided the opportunity to purchase the restricted business.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Services.&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;Under the Omnibus Agreement, Martin Resource Management provides the Partnership with corporate staff, support services, and administrative services necessary to operate the Partnership&#8217;s business. The Omnibus Agreement requires the Partnership to reimburse Martin Resource Management for all direct expenses it incurs or payments it makes on the Partnership&#8217;s behalf or in connection with the operation of the Partnership&#8217;s business. There is no monetary limitation on the amount the Partnership is required to reimburse Martin Resource Management for direct expenses.&#160;&#160;In addition to the direct expenses, under the Omnibus Agreement, the Partnership is required to reimburse Martin Resource Management for indirect general and administrative and corporate overhead expenses.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Effective January 1, 2017, through December 31, 2017, the Conflicts Committee approved an annual reimbursement amount for indirect expenses of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$16,416
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&#160;&#160;The Partnership reimbursed Martin Resource Management for
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$13,033
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$13,679
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$12,535
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of indirect expenses for the years ended December 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.&#160;&#160;The Conflicts Committee will review and approve future adjustments in the reimbursement amount for indirect expenses, if any, annually.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	These indirect expenses are intended to cover the centralized corporate functions Martin Resource Management provides for the Partnership, such as accounting, treasury, clerical, engineering, legal, billing, information technology, administration of insurance, general office expenses and employee benefit plans and other general corporate overhead functions the Partnership shares with Martin Resource Management retained businesses. The provisions of the Omnibus Agreement regarding Martin Resource Management&#8217;s services will terminate if Martin Resource Management ceases to control the general partner of the Partnership.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Related&#160;&#160;Party Transactions
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Omnibus Agreement prohibits the Partnership from entering into any material agreement with Martin Resource Management without the prior approval of the Conflicts Committee. For purposes of the Omnibus Agreement, the term material agreements means any agreement between the Partnership and Martin Resource Management that requires aggregate annual payments in excess of then-applicable agreed upon reimbursable amount of indirect general and administrative expenses. Please read "Services" above.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	License&#160;Provisions.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Under the Omnibus Agreement, Martin Resource Management has granted the Partnership a nontransferable, nonexclusive, royalty-free right and license to use certain of its trade names and marks, as well as the trade names and marks used by some of its affiliates.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Amendment and Termination.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Omnibus Agreement may be amended by written agreement of the parties; provided, however, that it may not be amended without the approval of the Conflicts Committee if such amendment would adversely affect the unitholders. The Omnibus Agreement was first amended on November 25, 2009, to permit the Partnership to provide refining services to Martin Resource Management.&#160;&#160;The Omnibus Agreement was amended further on October 1, 2012, to permit the Partnership to provide certain lubricant packaging products and services to Martin Resource Management.&#160;&#160;Such amendments were approved by the Conflicts Committee.&#160;&#160;The Omnibus Agreement, other than the indemnification provisions and the provisions limiting the amount for which the Partnership will reimburse Martin Resource Management for general and administrative services performed on its behalf, will terminate if the Partnership is no longer an affiliate of Martin Resource Management.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	93
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage97"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MARTIN MIDSTREAM PARTNERS L.P.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(Dollars in thousands, except where otherwise indicated)
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Motor Carrier Agreement
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Motor Carrier Agreement.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;The Partnership is a party to a motor carrier agreement effective January 1, 2006 as amended, with Martin Transport, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of Martin Resource Management through which Martin Transport, Inc. operates its land transportation operations. Under the agreement, Martin Transport, Inc. agreed to transport the Partnership's NGLs as well as other liquid products.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Term and Pricing.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;The agreement has an initial term that expired in December 2007 but automatically renews for consecutive
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	one
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	year periods unless either party terminates the agreement by giving written notice to the other party at least
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
<SPAN>
	30
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	days prior to the expiration of the then-applicable term.&#160;&#160;The Partnership has the right to terminate this agreement at any time by providing
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
<SPAN>
	90
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	days prior notice.&#160;&#160;Under this agreement, Martin Transport, Inc. transports the Partnership&#8217;s NGL shipments as well as other liquid products. These rates are subject to any adjustments which are mutually agreed or in accordance with a price index. Additionally, during the term of the agreement, shipping charges are also subject to fuel surcharges determined on a weekly basis in accordance with the U.S. Department of Energy&#8217;s national diesel price list.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Indemnification.&#160;&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Martin Transport has indemnified us against all claims arising out of the negligence or willful misconduct of Martin Transport and its officers, employees, agents, representatives and subcontractors. We indemnified Martin Transport against all claims arising out of the negligence or willful misconduct of us and our officers, employees, agents, representatives and subcontractors. In the event a claim is the result of the joint negligence or misconduct of Martin Transport and us, our indemnification obligations will be shared in proportion to each party&#8217;s allocable share of such joint negligence or misconduct.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Marine Agreements
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Marine Transportation Agreement
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Partnership is a party to a marine transportation agreement effective January 1, 2006, as amended, under which the Partnership provides marine transportation services to Martin Resource Management on a spot-contract basis at applicable market rates. &#160;Effective each January 1, this agreement automatically renews for consecutive
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	one
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	year periods unless either party terminates the agreement by giving written notice to the other party at least
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
<SPAN>
	60
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	days prior to the expiration of the then applicable term. The fees the Partnership charges Martin Resource Management are based on applicable market rates.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Marine Fuel.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;The Partnership is a party to an agreement with Martin Resource Management dated November 1, 2002 under which Martin Resource Management provides the Partnership with marine fuel from its locations in the Gulf of Mexico at a fixed rate in excess of a price index.&#160;&#160;Under this agreement, the Partnership agreed to purchase all of its marine fuel requirements that occur in the areas serviced by Martin Resource Management.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Terminal Services Agreements
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Diesel Fuel Terminal Services Agreement.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;Effective January 1, 2016, the Partnership entered into a new terminalling services agreement under which the Partnership provides terminal services to Martin Resource Management for marine fuel distribution.&#160; The per gallon throughput fee the Partnership charges under this agreement was increased when compared to the previous agreement and may be adjusted annually based on a price index.&#160; This agreement was amended on January 1, 2017 to reduce the minimum throughput requirements under such agreement.&#160;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Miscellaneous Terminal Services Agreements.&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Partnership is currently party to several terminal services agreements and from time to time the Partnership may enter into other terminal service agreements for the purpose of providing terminal services to related parties. Individually, each of these agreements is immaterial but when considered in the aggregate they could be deemed material. These agreements are throughput based with a minimum volume commitment. Generally, the fees due under these agreements are adjusted annually based on a price index.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other Agreements
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#160;&#160;Cross Tolling Agreement.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Partnership is a party to an amended and restated tolling agreement with Cross Oil Refining and Marketing, Inc. ("Cross") dated October 28, 2014, under which the Partnership processes crude oil into finished products, including naphthenic lubricants, distillates, asphalt and other intermediate cuts for Cross.&#160;&#160;The tolling agreement expires November 25, 2031.&#160;&#160;Under this tolling agreement, Cross agreed to process a minimum of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	6,500
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	barrels per day of
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	94
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage98"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MARTIN MIDSTREAM PARTNERS L.P.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(Dollars in thousands, except where otherwise indicated)
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	crude oil at the facility at a fixed price per barrel.&#160;&#160;Any additional barrels are processed at a modified price per barrel.&#160;&#160;In addition, Cross agreed to pay a monthly reservation fee and a periodic fuel surcharge fee based on certain parameters specified in the tolling agreement.&#160;&#160;All of these fees (other than the fuel surcharge) are subject to escalation annually based upon the greater of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	3%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or the increase in the Consumer Price Index for a specified annual period.&#160;&#160;In addition, on the third, sixth and ninth anniversaries of the agreement, the parties can negotiate an upward or downward adjustment in the fees subject to their mutual agreement.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Sulfuric Acid Sales Agency Agreement
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Partnership is party to a second amended and restated sulfuric acid sales agency agreement dated August 5, 2013, under which Martin Resource Management purchases and markets the sulfuric acid produced by the Partnership&#8217;s sulfuric acid production plant at Plainview, Texas, that is not consumed by the Partnership&#8217;s internal operations.&#160;&#160;This agreement, as amended, will remain in place until the Partnership terminates it by providing
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	180
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	days&#8217; written notice.&#160;&#160;Under this agreement, the Partnership sells all of its excess sulfuric acid to Martin Resource Management. Martin Resource Management then markets such acid to third-parties and the Partnership shares in the profit of Martin Resource Management&#8217;s sales of the excess acid to such third parties.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Other Miscellaneous Agreements.
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	From time to time the Partnership enters into other miscellaneous agreements with Martin Resource Management for the provision of other services or the purchase of other goods.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The tables below summarize the related party transactions that are included in the related financial statement captions on the face of the Partnership&#8217;s Consolidated Statements of Operations. The revenues, costs and expenses reflected in these tables are tabulations of the related party transactions that are recorded in the corresponding caption of the Consolidated Statements of Operations and do not reflect a statement of profits and losses for related party transactions.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other Related Party Transactions
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As discussed in Note 10, during March 2013, the Partnership acquired
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	100%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the preferred interests in MET, a subsidiary of Martin Resource Management, for
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$15,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. On August 31, 2014, MET converted its preferred equity to subordinated debt. The resulting
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$15,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	note receivable from MET bears an annual interest rate of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	15%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and matures August&#160;31, 2026. MET may prepay any or all of the note balance on or after September 1, 2016. The note is recorded in "Note receivable - Martin Energy Trading LLC" on the Partnership's Consolidated Balance Sheet. Interest income for the years ended December 31, 2016, 2015, and 2014 was
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$2,256
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$2,250
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$752
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively, and is included in "Interest expense, net" in the Consolidated Statements of Operations.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As discussed in Note 12, during the twelve months ended December 31, 2016 and 2015, the Partnership entered into certain derivative financial instruments through June 30, 2017 to protect a portion of its commodity price risk exposure related to NGLs. MET served as counterparty to the outstanding positions at December 31, 2016 and 2015.
</SPAN>
</DIV>

<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:7PT">
	1
</SUP>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Several factors are considered in the annual review process, including inflation rates, current estimates for removal cost, discount rates, and the estimated remaining useful life of the assets. The 2016 revisions reflect changes in removal cost estimates and the estimated remaining useful life of assets.&#160;
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	2
</SUP>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The current portion of asset retirement obligations is included in "Other current liabilities" on the Partnership's Consolidated Balance Sheets.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</SPAN>

	3
</SUP>
</SPAN>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:3PX DOUBLE #000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">

	808,107
</SPAN>
</SPAN>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage101"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MARTIN MIDSTREAM PARTNERS L.P.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(Dollars in thousands, except where otherwise indicated)
</SPAN>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:7PT">
	1
</SUP>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On April 27, 2016, the Partnership made certain strategic amendments to its credit facility which, among other things, decreased its borrowing capacity from
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$700,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$664,444
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and extended the maturity date of the facility from March 28, 2018 to March 28, 2020. The reduction in capacity resulted in the write-off of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$820
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of deferred debt costs.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:7PT">
	2
</SUP>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Interest rate fluctuates based on the LIBOR rate plus an applicable margin set on the date of each advance. The margin above LIBOR is set every three months. Indebtedness under the credit facility bears interest at LIBOR plus an applicable margin or the base prime rate plus an applicable margin. All amounts outstanding at December 31, 2016 and December 31, 2015 were at LIBOR plus an applicable margin. The applicable margin for revolving loans that are LIBOR loans ranges from
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	2.00%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	3.00%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and the applicable margin for revolving loans that are base prime rate loans ranges from
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	1.00%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	2.00%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The applicable margin for LIBOR borrowings at December 31, 2016 is
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	3.00%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&#160;&#160;The credit facility contains various covenants which limit the Partnership&#8217;s ability to make certain investments and acquisitions; enter into certain agreements; incur indebtedness; sell assets; and make certain amendments to the Omnibus Agreement. The Partnership is permitted to make quarterly distributions so long as no event of default exists.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:7PT">
	3
</SUP>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Partnership is in compliance with all debt covenants as of December 31, 2016.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:7PT">
	4
</SUP>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The 2021 indentures restrict the Partnership&#8217;s ability to sell assets; pay distributions or repurchase units or redeem or repurchase subordinated debt; make investments; incur or guarantee additional indebtedness or issue preferred units; and consolidate, merge or transfer all or substantially all of its assets. Many of these covenants will terminate if the notes achieve an investment grade rating from each of Moody&#8217;s Investors Service, Inc. and Standard &amp; Poor&#8217;s Ratings Services and no default (as defined in the indentures) has occurred.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Partnership paid cash interest, net of proceeds received from interest rate swaptions, in the amount of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$46,046
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$43,376
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$37,112
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the years ended December 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively. Capitalized interest was
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$1,126
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$1,944
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$1,437
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the years ended December 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>

</A>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(16) &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Partners' Capital
</SPAN>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of&#160;December 31, 2016, partners&#8217; capital consisted of&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	35,452,062
</SPAN>
</SPAN>

	&#160;common limited partner units, representing a&#160;
</SPAN>

<SPAN>
	98%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	partnership interest and a&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	2.0%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;general partner interest. Martin Resource Management, through subsidiaries, owned
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	6,264,532
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;of the Partnership's common limited partnership units representing approximately&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	17.7%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;of the Partnership's outstanding common limited partnership units. MMGP, the Partnership's general partner, owns the&#160;
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	2.0%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;general partnership interest.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-INDENT:42PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The partnership agreement of the Partnership (the "Partnership Agreement") contains specific provisions for the allocation of net income and losses to each of the partners for purposes of maintaining their respective partner capital accounts.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Issuance of Common Units
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On September 29, 2014, the Partnership completed a public offering of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	3,450,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	common units at a price of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$36.91
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per common unit, before the payment of underwriters' discounts, commissions and offering expenses (per unit value is in dollars, not thousands). Total proceeds from the sale of the
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	3,450,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	common units, net of underwriters' discounts, commissions and offering expenses, were
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$122,176
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Partnership's general partner contributed
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$2,599
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in cash to the Partnership in conjunction with the issuance in order to maintain its
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	2.0%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	general partner interest in the Partnership. All of the net proceeds were used to pay down outstanding amounts under the Partnership's revolving credit facility.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On August 29, 2014, the Partnership closed a private equity sale with Martin Resource Management, under which Martin Resource Management invested
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$45,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>

	in cash in exchange for
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	1,171,265
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	common units. The pricing of
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$38.42
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per common unit was based on the
</SPAN>

<SPAN>
	10
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-day weighted average price of the Partnership's common units for the
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	10
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	trading days ending August 8, 2014. In connection with the issuance of these common units, the Partnership's general partner contributed
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	$918
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in order to maintain its
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	2.0%
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	general partner interest in the Partnership. All of the net proceeds were used to pay down outstanding amounts under the Partnership's revolving credit facility.
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</SPAN>
</DIV>

</SPAN>

</SPAN>
</SPAN>

	per common unit, before the payment of underwriters' discounts, commissions and offering expenses (per unit value is in dollars, not thousands).&#160;&#160;Total proceeds from the sale of the
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<SPAN>
	3,600,000
</SPAN>
</SPAN>
<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	common units, net of underwriters' discounts, commissions and
</SPAN>
</DIV>
<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">

<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	98
</SPAN>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage102"></A>
<DIV>

<SPAN STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MARTIN MIDSTREAM PARTNERS L.P.
</SPAN>
</DIV>

</SPAN>
